org.gearvrf.animation

Class GVRMaterialAnimation

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gearvrf.animation.GVRAnimation
      • org.gearvrf.animation.GVRMaterialAnimation
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GVRColorAnimation, GVROpacityAnimation

    public abstract class GVRMaterialAnimation
extends GVRAnimation
    Animate a GVRMaterial. The constructors cast their target parameter to a protected final GVRMaterial mMaterial field.
